oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Construction of Ewart Hall from Qasr al-Nil street
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Construction of Ewart Hall began in 1927 and was completed in March 1928, after an anonymous donor donated $100,000 in 1925 for an auditorium.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: American University in Cairo -- Buildings; College buildings -- Egypt -- Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: AUC Photographs Collection; Rare Books and Special Collections Library; American University in Cairo
